vocabInfos.mediumDef:
A man of the tribe of Levi living at the time of Divided Monarchy, only mentioned at 1Ch.6.44;
son of: Abdi (H5660);
father of: Jeduthun (H3038); also called Kushaiah at 1Ch.15.17;
Another name of qi.shi (קִישִׁי "Kishi" H7029)
§ Kushaiah = "bow of Jehovah"
1) father of Ethan the Merarite
1a) same as 'Kish' or 'Kishi'
vocabInfos._es_Definition: padre de Etán, cantor del templo; tribu de Leví
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
古沙雅 这个陽性專有名詞 人名在原文的意思是 "耶和華之弓"
1) 米拉利人以探的父親 #代上 15:17|
1a) 同於 '基示' [7027] 或 [7029]
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
古沙雅 这个阳性专有名词 人名在原文的意思是 "耶和华之弓"
1) 米拉利人以探的父亲 #代上 15:17|
1a) 同于 '基示' [7027] 或 [7029]
